Title: Editing Videos for Product Promotion
Content: Editing videos for product promotion on Xiaohongshu involves several key steps to ensure the final video is engaging and effective. First, use a video editing software like Jianying. Open the software and select a suitable template. When choosing a template, ensure it is not too long and does not have too many elements. The music should be calm and match the platform's tone. Once you have selected a template, insert your images into the video. If you have a VIP subscription, you can unlock more features, but even without it, you can still edit effectively. Adjust the video's aspect ratio to 3:4, which is the recommended ratio for Xiaohongshu. Trim the video to the desired length, usually around 6-7 seconds, by splitting and deleting unnecessary parts. Next, adjust the composition of your images to make them look more appealing. This includes zooming in or out and positioning the images to highlight the product. Finally, apply filters to enhance the visual appeal of the video. Use the adjustment tools to tweak the brightness, contrast, and color balance. Once satisfied, export the video and upload it to Xiaohongshu for promotion.

Title: Choosing the Right Template
Content: Choosing the right template is crucial for creating an effective promotional video on Xiaohongshu. The template sets the tone and structure of your video, so it is important to select one that aligns with your content and the platform's style. Start by browsing through the available templates in your video editing software, such as Jianying. Look for templates that are not too long and do not have too many elements, as these can overwhelm the viewer. The music should be calm and match the platform's tone. Once you find a suitable template, consider how it will showcase your product. The template should allow you to insert images and videos of your product in a way that highlights its features. Pay attention to the template's transitions and effects, as these can enhance the overall appeal of your video. After selecting a template, customize it by inserting your images and adjusting the composition. This ensures that the final video is unique and tailored to your product. By carefully choosing the right template, you can create a professional and engaging promotional video that resonates with your audience on Xiaohongshu.

Title: Adjusting Image Composition and Filters
Content: Adjusting image composition and applying filters are essential steps in creating a visually appealing promotional video. Start by inserting your images into the selected template. Ensure that the images are well-composed, meaning they are positioned in a way that highlights the product's features. You can zoom in or out and adjust the placement of the images to make them more attractive. Next, apply filters to enhance the visual appeal of the video. Filters can adjust the brightness, contrast, and color balance of your images, making them look more professional. In Jianying, you can find the adjustment tools under the 'Adjust' section. Use these tools to tweak the image settings until you achieve the desired look. Be careful not to overdo it, as excessive adjustments can make the images look unnatural. Once you are satisfied with the composition and filters, apply these settings to the entire video to ensure consistency. This step ensures that your promotional video looks polished and professional, making it more likely to attract and engage viewers on Xiaohongshu.
